"Brigitta": "Planet Amduscia, Dragon Sanctum. Verification completed, monitoring your progress."
"This is a sacred and holy area known to the Dragonkin as the \"Sanctum\"."

"The Dragonkin dedicated to the defense of the Sanctum, known as the \"Lord of Dragons\" and the \"Guardian of Dragons\", work in pairs. They're known to attack intruders and will attack ARKS whenever present. Please be careful."
